mapper.insert: INSERT INTO privateAddr(addrNum, empNo, name, tel, email, groupNum) VALUES (seq_addr.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{groupNum})

INSERT INTO privateAddr(addrNum, empNo, name, tel, email, company, dName, dTel, dAddr, memo, groupNum) VALUES (seq_addr.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{company}, #{dName}, #{dTel}, #{dAddr}, #{memo}, #{groupNum})
mapper.select: SELECT groupNum, groupType FROM groupAddr ORDER BY groupNum

SELECT addrNum, empNo, name, tel, email, company, p.groupNum, groupType FROM privateAddr p JOIN groupAddr g ON p.GROUPNUM = g.GROUPNUM WHERE empNo = #{empNo} ORDER BY addrNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT addrNum, name, email, tel, company, dName, dTel, dAddr, memo, groupType FROM privateAddr p JOIN groupAddr g ON p.GROUPNUM = g.GROUPNUM WHERE addrNum = #{addrNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE privateAddr SET name = #{name}, empNo = #{empNo}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, company = #{company}, dName = #{dName}, dTel = #{dTel}, dAddr = #{dAddr}, memo = #{memo}, groupType = #{groupType} WHERE addrNum = #{addrNum}
UPDATE groupAddr SET groupType = #{groupType} WHERE groupNum = #{groupNum}
